trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_00<tab>Erenville looks expectantly for Wihuwte.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_01<tab>Unbeknownst to the people of Sheshenewezi Springs, ceruleum barrels there are being packed with stolen goods to be shipped away and sold elsewhere. Wihuwte, the deputy chief of the Dustwatch, is both the leader of the bandits and the mastermind behind this scheme. To bring him to justice, Zekowa proposes that two of you lure Wihuwte away to Hhusatahwi while the third remains to find these barrels. Erenville volunteers to stay and search, leaving you and Zekowa to keep Wihuwte occupied.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_02<tab>You approach Wihuwte, but he appears to be lost in thought. As he seems utterly determined to ignore you, perhaps a gentle /poke will get his attention.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_03<tab>Having gotten Wihuwte to acknowledge your existence, you proceed to tell him that Zekowa attempted to rob you, but that you managed to subdue and capture him. While he appears slightly skeptical, he is nevertheless eager to follow you so he can tie up this loose end.
※You must be accompanied by Wihuwte to complete this task. Speak with him again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_04<tab>You lead Wihuwte a ways into the desert. After coming to a stop, Wihuwte looks to you expectantly, but you claim to have misremembered where you left Zekowa. Not one to be deterred, the deputy chief bids you continue.
※You must be accompanied by Wihuwte to complete this task. Speak with him again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_05<tab>You stop at another clearing, and again offer an excuse for why Zekowa is nowhere to be found. Wihuwte is clearly annoyed, but he asks you to keep going.
※You must be accompanied by Wihuwte to complete this task. Speak with him again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_06<tab>Wihuwte's patience is wearing thin by the time you pause yet again to get your bearings. He warns you that if Zekowa is not at your next destination, he may be forced to do something you both regret.
※You must be accompanied by Wihuwte to complete this task. Speak with him again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_07<tab>Wihuwte is seething, but before he can make good on his earlier threat, he is distracted by yelling nearby. He follows the voice a short distance to find a grinning Zekowa, who leads the deputy chief on a merry chase that ends back in Hhusatahwi. He prepares to arrest Zekowa, but in that moment Erenville arrives with a barrel full of the townsfolks' stolen possessions, and subsequently reveals the existence of the bandit's operation to a growing crowd. Accusing the deputy chief of being behind this criminal enterprise, Zekowa challenges Wihuwte to a duel, who is forced to accept. The ensuing altercation is over in the blink of an eye, and Wihuwte falls to the ground defeated.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SEQ_08<tab>Wihuwte has been arrested, and Zekowa's friends are freed from jail. Thanks to you and Erenville, it would seem everything in Sheshenewezi Springs has at last been put to rights.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wihuwte.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_TODO_01<tab>/poke Wihuwte and have him accompany you.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_TODO_02<tab>Survey the designated location while Wihuwte is accompanying you.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_TODO_03<tab>Survey the designated location while Wihuwte is accompanying you.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_TODO_04<tab>Survey the designated location while Wihuwte is accompanying you.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_TODO_05<tab>Head to the designated location while accompanied by Wihuwte and then speak with him.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_000<tab>Well, well, look who it is.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_001<tab>Storing stolen goods here seems risky, but I suppose it's an option for someone with his authority.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_002<tab>Yeah. He moves the spoils in ceruleum barrels, where no one would think to look.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_003<tab>They're mixed in with regular shipments of fuel to Tuliyollal, where they're sold off.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_004<tab>You said he stole a bracelet of yours, right? If he knows you're on his tail, chances are he'll be eager to get what he can for it.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_100_004<tab>But I doubt he'd trust a lackey with that business, given the provenance of the piece. No, I'll wager he's not letting that bracelet out of his sight till he's got coin in hand.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_005<tab>I wasn't sure what to make of you after Hhusatahwi, but I'm glad to see you're more than an impulsive child.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_006<tab>Ah, well...not my finest hour, I'll admit...

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_007<tab>But there's a lesson in that: the Vulture's a slippery bastard. If we're going to catch him, we need to back him into a corner with hard evidence. That's my plan.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_008<tab>First, we need to lure him away from here─over to Hhusatahwi would be ideal. For that, I need one of you to help me.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_009<tab>This will buy time for the other to search the barrels for any stolen goods.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_010<tab>And using that, we'll expose him as a criminal.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_100_010<tab>There's no way to tell if Wihuwte's carrying the bracelet, but regardless, there'll be time enough to find it once he's behind bars.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_011<tab>But won't he simply feign innocence?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_012<tab>Oh, he'll try. And <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> when I'll challenge him to a duel!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_013<tab>A duel? That approach didn't work out so well for your friends, as I recall.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_014<tab>True. But unlike before, I'll challenge him in front of the whole town. That way he won't be able to wriggle out of it like before.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_015<tab>Every man, woman, and child of the wilds understands the importance of duels and the old laws. The <var 1A 02 /var>deputy chief<var 1A 01 /var> would never disgrace himself by refusing.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_016<tab>But wouldn't you be breaking the law by using a firearm in town?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_017<tab>It's not as if we'd be using live rounds, but it's a risk I'm willing to take.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_018<tab>What's important is that I get him to duel with as many witnesses as possible. When he loses─and he <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> lose─that'll be the end of the Vulture.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_019<tab>The plan is not without flaws, but...what do you think?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A1_000_001<tab>I say let Zekowa have his duel.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A1_000_002<tab>We can trust in the old laws.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A1_000_003<tab>As long as we get the bracelet back.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_021<tab>Thanks. I sure was lucky running into the two of you. You won't regret this, I promise!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_022<tab>Not even he can ignore our traditions. Once he loses, I'll have him confess to his crimes.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_023<tab>That bracelet's really important to you, huh? Don't worry. I'll see to it you get it back.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_024<tab>If you're satisfied, then so am I.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_025<tab>I knew I could count on you!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_026<tab>I was seen in Tonatenyawi, so it's probably best I stay and search the barrels.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_027<tab>Then you're with me. Tell the Vulture I tried to rob you, but you managed to overpower me. Even if he suspects a trap, he won't be able to resist taking the bait.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_028<tab>You'll want to buy your friend as much time as possible, and make your way to Hhusatahwi. Once you've got the Vulture there, I'll take care of the rest!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_029<tab>All right, then. Let's get to it!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_030<tab>Shouldn't be long now before Wihuwte shows up.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_040<tab>The yeheheceyaa were likely that Shetona's doing. What's his angle?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_100_040<tab>Hmph. And then there's the brat. It's past time I dealt with him.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Wihuwte is oblivious to your presence. Perhaps a gentle <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will get his attention.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_050<tab>Hm? What's this?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_051<tab>Ah, an unfamiliar face in these parts. Ahem. Have you need of the Dustwatch, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_052<tab>What? Zekowa tried to rob you, but you apprehended him!?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_053<tab>I see... So desperate was he to see his friends free from prison, he turned to a life of crime. How awful...
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_054<tab>You have my sincerest thanks, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Might I trouble you to take me to him?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>Wihuwte is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>You can leave Wihuwte behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>If you wish to have Wihuwte accompany you again, return and speak with him again at the original location.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A2_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A2_000_002<tab>Part ways with Wihuwte.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_059<tab>Something the matter? If not, then please, lead on.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Wihuwte?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_061<tab>You have somewhere to be? Very well, but I implore you to hurry. I have a duty to see this criminal brought to justice.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_062<tab>That was a distressingly long wait, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. But I presume you can show me to the miscreant <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>You must be accompanied by Wihuwte and have him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>Wihuwte has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A2_100_000<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Ask about Sheshenewezi Springs.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_067<tab>Not that this is an appropriate time for me to play tour guide, but if you insist... Sheshenewezi Springs is home to a thriving ceruleum mining industry. The prospect of easy coin has attracted some <var 1A 02 /var>undesirables<var 1A 01 /var>, though...
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_070<tab>Is this the place? I don't see him...
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A3_000_001<tab>Whoops, silly me. This isn't the right place.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A3_000_002<tab>Just a little further.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_072<tab>I see... <sigh> Very well, lead on.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A3_100_000<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Ask about the ceruleum fields.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_075<tab>There's gold in these fields. Blue gold...
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_076<tab>Ahem. Best be wary of the beasts in these parts. They may prefer to snack on ceruleum, but for you I reckon they'd make an exception.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_080<tab>Is <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> the place, then?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A4_000_001<tab>I could have sworn I left him here...
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A4_000_002<tab>Sorry. I'm still learning my away around.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_082<tab>This some sort of joke? Of all the... Let's keep moving.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_090<tab>This better be the place.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A5_000_001<tab>Ah, now I remember!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A5_000_002<tab>I left him tied up around a big rock. Must have been a different rock.

TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_092<tab>My patience is wearing awfully thin, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. If he isn't at the next place we stop, I may be forced to do something you and I would both dearly regret.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_095<tab>Hurry up already!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A5_100_000<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Ask about the nopalitenders.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_098<tab>Unless you'd rather I feed you one raw─needles and all─cut the chitchat.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_100<tab>All right, where is he?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_101<tab>I don't see him anywhere! Where is Zekowa!?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_102<tab>Tell me where he is, or I'll bury you in the same grave.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A6_000_001<tab>Confound it, he must have escaped!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_A6_000_002<tab>Goodness me, where could he have gone?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_104<tab>That's it! I've had it with these games, and I've had it with you!!!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_105<tab>(-Zekowa-)Hey, Wihuwte! You looking for me?
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_106<tab>If you want to place me under arrest, you'll have to work a little harder!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_WIHUWTE_000_107<tab>You'll be begging for a cell by the time I'm done with you!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ERENVILLE_000_110<tab>That ended up being rather more complicated than expected, but all's well that ends well.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_111<tab>Phew! Finally, it's over!
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_112<tab>I couldn't have brought him to justice without your help. I don't know how I'll ever repay you.
TEXT_KINGMD105_04916_ZEKOWA_000_115<tab>Hahaha! That was a pretty nice shot, right?
